  • Example Post

    May 7, 2016

    Some basic Markdown syntax to guide how to write a post. First at all, jekyll will automatically takes the first block of text, from the beginning of the content to the first occurrence of excerpt_separator. We may override this auto excerpt by adding excerpt value into the page or add customse excerpt_separator in a post or globally. ... [more]
